alert.note: Alert for Lamar; Pike; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 2:09PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Pike, northeastern Upson and southern Lamar Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 209 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Meansville, or near Zebulon, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Barnesville, Meansville, Aldora, The Rock, Piedmont and Hannahs Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
